visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. The chart should also have custom colors for the columns and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'column', and it includes a background color and specific margins for better visual appeal. The title and axes labels are styled with custom colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The data series represents monthly rainfall data, with the series name 'Rainfall' and a custom color for the columns. Additionally, the legend is disabled to keep the chart clean and focused on the data. This configuration ensures that the chart is visually appealing and effectively communicates the monthly rainfall data.
